meanings.definition: A group of synthetic dyes derived from indigo.
meanings.sent1: The artist used indigoids to create vibrant blue colors in the painting.
meanings.sent2: The indigoids in the fabric gave it a deep blue hue.
meanings.sent3: The indigoids decided to have a color party and turned everything blue!
meanings.sent4: Her love for indigoids was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The indigoids danced on the canvas, bringing it to life with shades of blue.

meanings.definition: Any of various blue or violet pigments.
meanings.sent1: The sky at dusk was painted with indigoids, creating a beautiful scene.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed indigoids to get the perfect shade of blue for the sky.
meanings.sent3: The indigoids in the paint tubes whispered to each other about their favorite shades of blue.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like indigoids under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The indigoids bloomed in the garden, painting it in shades of blue and violet.
